verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>letter<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> which were <S%H1473>carried<s%> away <S%H1473>captives,<s%> and to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and to the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had <S%H1540>carried<s%> away <S%H1473>captive<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>

<S%H310>(After<s%> that <S%H3204>Jeconiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and the <S%H1377>queen,<s%> and the <S%H5631>eunuchs,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H2796>carpenters,<s%> and the <S%H4525>smiths,<s%> were <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>)

By the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H501>Elasah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and <S%H1587>Gemariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> <S%H834>(whom<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon)<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H1473>carried<s%> away <S%H1473>captives,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have caused to be <S%H1540>carried<s%> away from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>
<S%H1129>Build<s%> you <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in them; and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of them;

<S%H3947>Take<s%> you <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> for your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H582>husbands,<s%> that they may <S%H3205>bear<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> that you may be <S%H7235>increased<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and not <S%H4591>diminished.<s%>

And <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have caused you to be <S%H1540>carried<s%> away <S%H1540>captives,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for it: for in the <S%H7965>peace<s%> thereof shall you <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> Let not your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and your <S%H7080>diviners,<s%> that be in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you, <S%H5377>deceive<s%> you, <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to your <S%H2472>dreams<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you cause to be <S%H2492>dreamed.<s%>
For they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> to you in my <S%H8034>name:<s%> I have not <S%H7971>sent<s%> them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> That <S%H6310>after<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> be <S%H4390>accomplished<s%> at <S%H894>Babylon<s%> I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> you, and <S%H6965>perform<s%> my <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> you, in causing you to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> that I <S%H2803>think<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and not of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you an <S%H8615>expected<s%> <S%H319>end.<s%>
Then shall you <S%H7121>call<s%> on me, and you shall <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> to me, and I will <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you.
And you shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> me, and <S%H4672>find<s%> me, <S%H3588>when<s%> you shall <S%H1875>search<s%> for me with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

And I will be <S%H4672>found<s%> of you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> away your <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> you <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> from <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I caused you to be <S%H1540>carried<s%> away <S%H1540>captive.<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6965>raised<s%> us up <S%H5030>prophets<s%> in <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>

Know that <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H3427>sits<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> that are not <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with you into <S%H1473>captivity;<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> on them the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and will <S%H5414>make<s%> them like <S%H8182>vile<s%> <S%H8384>figs,<s%> that <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H398>eaten,<s%> they are so <S%H7455>evil.<s%>

And I will <S%H7291>persecute<s%> <S%H310><s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> with the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and with the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to be a <S%H423>curse,<s%> and an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and an <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> them:

<S%H8478>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to my <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7971>sent<s%> to them by my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H7925>rising<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> them; but you would not <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> you therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6964>Kolaiah,<s%> and of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> which <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> to you in my <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and he shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>

And of them shall be <S%H3947>taken<s%> up a <S%H7045>curse<s%> by <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1546>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> you like <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> and like <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7033>roasted<s%> in the <S%H784>fire;<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H5039>villainy<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with their <S%H7453>neighbors'<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> and have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have not <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them; even I <S%H3045>know,<s%> and am a <S%H5707>witness,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Thus shall you also <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>speaks<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> in your <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and to <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H3548>priest<s%> in the <S%H8478>stead<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that you should be <S%H6496>officers<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for every <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H7696>mad,<s%> and makes himself a <S%H5012>prophet,<s%> that you should <S%H5414>put<s%> him in <S%H4115>prison,<s%> and in the <S%H6729>stocks.<s%>
<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H4100>why<s%> have you not <S%H1605>reproved<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> which makes himself a <S%H5012>prophet<s%> to you?

For <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to us in <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> captivity is <S%H752>long:<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> you <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in them; and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H1593>gardens,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of them.
And <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> this <S%H5612>letter<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7971>Send<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> them of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite;<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> that <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> to you, and I <S%H7971>sent<s%> him not, and he caused you to <S%H982>trust<s%> in a <S%H8267>lie:<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H5161>Nehelamite,<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed:<s%> he shall not <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I will <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H1696>taught<s%> <S%H5627>rebellion<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
